name: Johnny Shoots
text: I was so impressed when I came here. The staff was super friendly and helpful. They checked on us throughout our meal and did a wonderful job of explaining all their ingredients. And the facility was super clean and had a great atmosphere. ‚Ä¶More

name: Laury Smith
text: Pretty good pizza. They have one size that feeds 1 hungry dude. Or 2 kinda hungry woman. The only other meal option is a choice of 4 different salads. However, if you're like me & u want both pizza & salad, they have a 1/2 pizza  & side ‚Ä¶More

name: Cole Bershinsky
text: Just like MOD Pizza.  Great pizza and you can make it any way you want. Friendly service and good atmosphere. I would recommend this to a friend.

name: Alyssa Hawkins
text: Best pizza in town!! Always made to order with unlimited fresh toppings! I love topping my pie off with goasted garlic, basil and balsamic glaze!

name: Jaici Wilson
text: Best pizza out there!  Much more topping selections than Mod in my opinion, very tasty.  Will visit again, and again!

name: Jamie Crowe

name: Holly Rose
text: Great pizza and friendly service. You get it your way! An individual pizza is priced very reasonably. This is much more than your normal take out or delivery pizza. Fresh ingredients and crust, add toppings for no additional charge. ‚Ä¶More

name: Cody Jackson
text: I've been here twice and both times everyone was exceptionally friendly. They are fast too...we went for Pi Day and there was a line around the building but it was apparent that they were doing their best to keep things moving. Pizza tastes great!

name: Ashley Young
text: This is by far one of my favorite pizza places. I love the individual sizes, just the right amount for one person. I also appreciate that I can put as much as I want on the pizza and all at an affordable price between $8-10.I also like that ‚Ä¶More

name: Sang Sumrall
text: It's good pizza. Can't say it's worth the long wait. It's small space. There's a long line. Overall decent pizza. Good to at least try but out.

name: ghost snax
text: This place is phenomenal! The staff is great and the food is nothing less than excellent. The selection here for toppings and sauces is far superior to mod in every way. If you choose any place in town like this to eat, make it blaze. They will not let you down (unlike mod)

name: Michael Moran
text:

text: Delicious thin crust pizza. All ingredients are fresh and there are many options to make your own pizza if you desire. I had the BBQ chicken pizza and it was fantastic. They make the dough fresh everyday - you can watch them make it while you wait in line. Friendly and hardworking staff, inviting atmosphere. Will definitely be back.

name: Byron Brownfield

name: Jaimy Criswell
text: FYI: This placed has since closed permanently with no notice. Awesome food!! Wonderful customer service. Fresh ingredients, home made drinks and made from scratch preservative free crust. Even the sodas are natural. Great gluten free options also. We love playing shuffleboard after eating too :).

name: Brett Barney
text: Really good pizza for the area. Let's be honest. There aren't very many good places to grab a GOOD pizza in Colorado Springs. Everything tasted fresh. The sauce actually had flavor, which I have to tell you is like striking gold in this ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristy Harris
text: Great service, friendly staff, and absolutely the ‚Äúbest‚Äù pizzas! I‚Äôve fallen in ‚Äúlove‚Äù with how quick the service is.  The prices here are so worth the trip to pick up instead of waiting an hour for home delivery.

name: Danielle Babb
text: Friendly, welcoming, & knowledgeable staff. Great service & very clean restaurant. Food was delicious and very inexpensive. It was a cool experience, it's kind of like the pizza version of Subway. You build your pizza, your way and there is ‚Ä¶More

text: I love the fresh, customized pizzas made right in front of you. I hate the atmosphere at mod pizza, and this offers a similar dining experience in a much more relaxed environment. Can't wait to go back!

text:
I love Blaze but the customer service at this location very mediocre.

name: Brandy Allen
text: My boyfriend and I have gone here 2 times now and have enjoyed it every time!  The pizzas are the PERFECT size for people who get full fast and those who have a large appetite.  We actually prefer them over the beloved MOD pizza in our area.

name: Dustin Gray
text: My wife and I tried Blaze out of pure curiosity after I had read a number of positive articles about them, including how Lebron James is one of the original investors in the company. ‚Ä¶More

name: Samantha Green
text: Love their BOY pizzas. I‚Äôm here all the time! I like the concept that you can add whatever toppings you like and it‚Äôs the same price. Also, you can add a drizzle to the top once it‚Äôs done cooking.

name: Michaela Fosdick
text: My boyfriend and I had gone by this place multiple times, and finally decided to try it. We were quite impressed and will definitely be going back! We went during a slower time and the employees were friendly and helpful with our order. You ‚Ä¶More

name: Wendy
text: WOW! This was our first time here and we'll definitely be returning. ALL the employees were really upbeat and friendly! The concept is that each person builds their own pizza. The original crust had a good flavor and great texture, chewy ‚Ä¶More

name: Frank Walters
text: Great pizza! Love the wood fired char.  The sauce and most toppings were fresh, the mushrooms looked a little past their shelf life.  Definately a great deal, higher quality than most pizza places in COS,  12 inch 2 topping with drink roughly $10, that's a deal.

name: M Nich
text: Amazing amazing amazing. We went the night before they opened and they let us come in to friends and family night of the workers even though we were neither and ate for FREE! So affordable and so fresh!! I could just eat their marinara by itself!! I'm not really even a pizza lover but would love eating here at least once a week!

name: Brandon Johnson
text: I like going to places like this! Super quick service and delicious food! The staff was polite. Compared to other places, I'd still go here! It's not too far from where I live, but I wish there were more!

name: Anthony Castello
text: This place is awesome! Ingredients are nice, plenty to choose from. Staff was friendly and helpful. Love this place

name: Amanda Engel
text: We went to Blaze for the first time a couple of nights ago. We were really impressed by how friendly the employees were towards us. They were eager to help us navigate the menu and process. The pizza was phenomenal. The crust was crispy ‚Ä¶More

name: Larry King
text: The staff was awesome, extremely friendly and outgoing. The pizza was excellent, we ordered three unique pizzas and they all turned out great. It's easy to draw a comparison against another fast-pizza chain, but we felt like Blaze had a superior product and nicer staff. We definitely will he coming back.

name: Josh Faulkner
text: Great concept for build-your-own pizza! I really appreciated the wide selection of ingredients and the pre-built recipes to build off of. On my first visit, I was treated to a thorough explanation of how ordering works, and I was also ‚Ä¶More

name: Monalisa Taylor
text: Yes please! Who doesn't like a wood fired pizza?! I love this place because it's pretty cheap ($23.75 for 2 pizzas and 2 drinks) AND the pizza is great. Thin crust medium sized pizza made right in front of you. It's so delicious. Another ‚Ä¶More

name: Jack Rhoades, II
text: An excellent personal pizza made to order. Toppings I had were pepperoni, salami, sausage, bacon, ricotta cheese, and parmesan cheese. The crust was done just right without over cooking the toppings. The employees were all really nice as well as knowledgeable about their products. I will return.

name: Sailor Mar at the Bar
text: Waited an hour and half before we just decided to cancel our order and get a refund. Perhaps they have good pizza but we'll never know. Not coming back.

name: Ronald Boland
text: Best build your own pizza. Quick service with a great staff, very friendly! Love the taste of the crust that is made fresh daily on site. We will be eating here again!

name: Jessica Snell
text: It was a great first time trying Blaze! The employees were very informative and let us know how everything worked and what our options were! Definitely recommend!

name: Theodore Dresie
text: Great pizza place! Fast and delicious! Custom made to your liking including gluten free crust if needed. Tremendous salads (single serving or entree!)

name: Steve Lee
text: A very good "build your own" pizza place.  I like that they have fresh mozzarella as an option in addition to many other cheeses and toppings.   The staff is very friendly and helpful and the pizza is ready in less than 5 minutes.

name: Michelle Nyquist
text: This place is delicious.Family friendly . The whole staff are accommodating and establish eye contact and conversation while creating your pizza. You can choose to create a pizza or chose off the menu. One set price. Also Gluten-Free pizza! All pizza is cooked in a Fire oven that cooks within 5 to 7 min.

name: Alianna Higgins
text: Oh my goodness this place is great! Really wonderful staff and service, and to top it off, the pizza is absolutely amazing! Super fresh ingredients and whooo boy do I love their red sauce. I‚Äôll definitely be returning!

name: Shawn Hansen
text: I am a long time Blaze Pizza fan. I can say that this location in particular has well trained staff and expected timely service. Pizza was great!! I'm so happy to have one of these in the Springs!

name: Christel Robinson
text: Great customer service ..fresh items to choose from.. Family atmosphere!! Good food

name: Brandon
text: Pretty good pizza. They blast horrible music inside and you can't have a conversation. Get your food to go because the pizza is really good

text: Awesome service! They told me they just opened yesterday! It was packed and they were still handling it well! The staff seems very well trained! I'd definitely recommend this place!

text: Took 45 min from when we entered the restaurant until we sat down and got our food. And there were maybe 8 people in front of us. A lot of people just bailed. It was tasty though.

text: My wife and I visited Blaze Pizza at 9:00 pm on 05/39/2018 and had a very good experience. Although it was late, our pizzas were fresh and tasted great. The staff provided excellent customer service.

name: Alexis Alderman
text: Awesome, upbeat, friendly staff! Love the menu, and everything is the same price, so if you want to add to a specialty it's no extra cost. Delicious pizza!

name: Charlene Barnes
text: Love it that they put whatever you want on your pizza and if it's not enough they will add more! Good price for what you get and they are always friendly!!
